item.title: #en @ 1452998621763457040
item.description:
The @WorldBank Global Jobs Indicator database (JOIN) is one of the first databases that allows users to explore wages on such a large scale for development. This includes calculating wage gaps among different types of workers.
See it for yourself: https://t.co/F4WzK343nr

item.title: #en @ 1452996562745970696
item.description: First results from travel-time matrixes I'm making for GB. Map shows MSOA centroids coloured by the number other centroids that are within a 2-hour drive.
